name: telegram clear dark by book777
description: Theme with background and different block colors support for web.telegram.org telegram.me t.me telegram.org web.telegram.org.ru Tags: telegram, telegram.org, web.telegram.org, телеграм, telegram.me, t.me
additional_info:
If you choose "Image and opacity and blurred blocks" you must enable experimental function:
ಮ Chrome: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features
ಮ Opera: opera://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features

Current version 6.5.1
